content: In the file src/test/ui/regions/regions-refcell.rs the second foo function now compiles and even run without a problem. What's the methodology to update that ? (If it should be updated)
if you intended for it to change, add // check-pass
For that particular test you might want to slice it out into a new test, but make sure it passes, instead of not.
since most of that file is a regression test for a single issue.
